titleStmt.title: Loves entercours between the Lamb & his bride, Christ and his Church. Or, A clear explication and application of the Song of Solomon. By William Guild, D.D. and preacher of God's Word.
titleStmt.author: Guild, William, 1586-1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson for Ralph Smith, and are to be sold at his shop at the Bible in Cornhill.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nouemb 25"; the 8 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "7".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
